Constant Field Values

TIMESTAMP

Constant Field Values

MIN_ASK_PERIOD

private static final int MIN_ASK_PERIOD
The interval between input requests to the server varies between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD, depending on the result from the last requests. If MAX_FAILURE_COUNT or more consecutive requests fail, the interval will be MAX_ASK_PERIOD otherwise it is a value interpolated between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_ASK_PERIOD

private static final int MAX_ASK_PERIOD
The interval between input requests to the server varies between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD, depending on the result from the last requests. If MAX_FAILURE_COUNT or more consecutive requests fail, the interval will be MAX_ASK_PERIOD otherwise it is a value interpolated between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_FAILURE_COUNT

private static final int MAX_FAILURE_COUNT
The interval between input requests to the server varies between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD, depending on the result from the last requests. If MAX_FAILURE_COUNT or more consecutive requests fail, the interval will be MAX_ASK_PERIOD otherwise it is a value interpolated between MIN_ASK_PERIOD and MAX_ASK_PERIOD.

receivedLastRequest

private boolean receivedLastRequest
Input requests are only made after we get a response for the previous request. This flag indicates whether we have received the response or not.

serverListener

private ServerListener serverListener
The ServerListener that will receive server events (i.e. the WidgetManager)

map

private int map(int sLow,
                int sHigh,
                int tLow,
                int tHigh,
                int sValue)
Helper method that maps a value in a source range to a value in a target range. The resulting value is truncated at the target's range limits.

Parameters:
sLow - The source range's lower limit.
sHigh - The source range's higher limit.
tLow - The target range's lower limit.
tHigh - The target range's higher limit.
sValue - The value (in source range) to map.
Returns:
The mapped value (in the target range) truncated at the range's limits.

processWidgetAddSuccess

private void processWidgetAddSuccess(java.lang.String json)
This method is called when the server replies to a widget post. This method goes through the existing widgets and checks if any reference code changed. If so, it notifies the widget.

Parameters:
json -
